Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Ryu Chun Ok 
    Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il yesterday sent a wreath to the bier of Ryu Chun Ok, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, winner of Kim Il Sung Order, Twice Woman Labour Hero and manager of the Ryokpho stock-farm, expressing deep condolence over her death.

Greetings to Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Senegalese President 
    Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Abodulaye Wade, President of Senegal, on April 1 on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of Independence of his country.
 Wholeheartedly wishing him and his people greater success in the work for national prosperity and development of the country, Kim expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably.
